workflow: MISSION: 1. Login. 2. Navigate to PIM module and Add a new employee (FirstNameTest LastNameTest). 3. Click SAVE to finish onboarding. 4. Navigate to Admin module -> User Management -> Users. 5. Create a System User for the newly created employee. THE MISSION IS ONLY SUCCESSFUL IF ALL STEPS ARE COMPLETED.

trace.thought: The current page is the login page, and the goal requires me to log in first. I will fill in the username and password fields using the default credentials and then click the login button. I will use the proven locators from the knowledge bank to ensure stability.

I am on the login page and need to enter the password to complete the login process. The first step of the goal is to log in, and I have already filled in the username. Now I will fill in the password using the element with the text 'Password'.

The goal is to login to the OrangeHRM demo site. I have already filled the username and password fields. Now I need to click the login button to proceed. According to the knowledge bank, I should verify the presence of a unique dashboard element after login, using a reasonable timeout (e.g., 10 seconds) before proceeding with further steps.
I have successfully logged in. The next step in the goal is to navigate to the PIM module. I will use the knowledge bank to find the correct locator for the PIM link on the dashboard page.

I am on the dashboard page after logging in. The goal is to navigate to the PIM module, add a new employee, save, navigate to the Admin module, and create a system user. The next step is to navigate to the PIM module. I will use the 'PIM' link with id 12 or 27.
I have successfully logged in and navigated to the PIM module. The next step is to add a new employee. I will click the 'Add' button on the Employee List page to navigate to the Add Employee page.

I am currently on the Employee List page. The goal is to add a new employee. Step 2 of the goal is to navigate to the PIM module and add a new employee. I am already in the PIM module, so I need to click the 'Add' button to add a new employee. According to the knowledge bank, the 'Add' button has a stability of 12 on the EmployeeListPage. I will click the 'Add' button to navigate to the Add Employee page.

I am currently on the 'Add Employee' page and need to fill in the employee details as per the goal. The goal specifies 'FirstNameTest LastNameTest' for the first and last names. After filling the names, I need to click the 'Save' button to complete this step. The history shows that I have already navigated to the 'Add Employee' page. I will now fill in the first name, middle name, and last name fields.
I am currently on the 'Add Employee' page and have already filled in the first name. The next step is to fill in the last name, as per the goal description. I will use the 'Last Name' input field.

I am currently on the 'Add Employee' page and have already filled in the first name and last name. The next step is to click the 'Save' button to complete the employee onboarding process, as per step 3 of the goal. According to the Knowledge Bank, after saving a new employee, the application may redirect to the Employee Personal Details page instead of the Employee List page. Therefore, I will click the 'Save' button and expect to land on the 'Personal Details' page or see a success toast.

The current page is the 'Add Employee' page, and the previous steps involved filling the first name, last name, and clicking the save button. According to the goal, the next step is to navigate to the Admin module. I will click on the 'Admin' link to navigate to the Admin module.

I am currently on the PIM > Personal Details page, which is the page that appears after successfully saving a new employee. The goal is to navigate to the Admin module. I will click on the 'Admin' link to navigate to the Admin module. This addresses step 4 of the goal: 'Navigate to Admin module -> User Management -> Users.'

The goal is to create a System User for the newly created employee. The current page is the System Users page. The previous steps involved logging in, navigating to the PIM module, adding a new employee, saving the employee, and navigating to the Admin module. Now, I need to click the 'Add' button on the System Users page to create a new system user. According to the Knowledge Bank, the SystemUsersPage has a proven locator for the 'Add' button.

I am currently on the Admin module page, as indicated by the page title and context. The goal is to navigate to Admin module -> User Management -> Users, and then create a system user. I have already clicked on the Admin module link. Now I need to navigate to User Management -> Users. I will click on the 'User Management' list item.
